# SingleStoreDateTime.GetDateTime method

Returns a DateTime value (if [`IsValidDateTime`](./IsValidDateTime.md) is `true`), or throws a [`SingleStoreConversionException`](../SingleStoreConversionException.md).

public DateTime GetDateTime()
